actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to authorize the R. Edward Bellamy, doctor of philosophy, a retired officer of the Commissioned Corps of the United States Public Health Service to accept employment by the Canadian Department of Agriculture.

summary.text: Authorizes a certain retired Public Health Service official to accept employment in the Canadian Department of Agriculture without loss of retirement benefits.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the R. Edward Bellamy, doctor of philosophy, a retired officer of the Commissioned Corps of the United States Public Health Service to accept employment by the Canadian Department of Agriculture.
